markdownRemark.html:
The first meeting of the Jacksonville Mobile User Group will be next Thursday, June 21st. The first meeting will be held at the Southside library. The first presentation will be on going from zero to the app store. Here is the note from the group manager;

Your local Mobile User Group is scheduled to have its first meeting on June 21st. If you have an interest in mobile apps and webapps you can find out more about the group at www.jaxmug.com

-Ovi

I hope to see you there.

frontmatter.title: First JaxMUG meeting next Thursday June 21st.
Screencast on how to integrate the Web API with the iOS SDK
